post.author: Brian
post.content:
Title:  Sr. Programmer Analyst

Department: IT - Application Development
Reporting to:  Mgr., Application Development
Position Type:  Contract
Summary: Posted June 30/04. This is a six month contract.
Primary Responsibilities:  Provides recommendations to lead developer on best system solutions
Provides time estimates for all assigned tasks
Develops and documents technical solutions for tasks assigned
Designs and builds solution
Performs unit testing of all programming changes to ensure changes are working according to specifications.
Delivers all tasks on time and on budget.

Qualifications:  Excellent analytical skills
5 years experience developing in C++/MFC Knowledge of COM, ATL, STL, XML, .NET an asset
Knowledge of Life Insurance business an asset
Ability to work in high paced environment
Self starter and option thinker
Strong communication skills
University or college diploma or certificate in Computer Science

Salary:  band P5
Contact Information:  For further information, please contact Stephen White at 416-883-5466 . If interested, please send a resume via fax to 416-5455 or via E-mail to stephen.white@aegoncanada.ca .
post.title: Job Openings at AEGON Canada
